description.english: Defeat the first boss : Cursed Bones.
description.french: Battez le premier boss : Cursed Bones.
description.italian: Sconfiggi il primo boss : Ossa Maledette.
description.spanish: Derrota al primer jefe: Huesos Malditos.
description.schinese: 首次击倒序章的头目：诅咒巨人骸骨。
description.japanese: 最初のボスを撃破： 呪われた巨人の遺骨。
description.brazilian: Derrote o primeiro chefe: Cursed Bones.

description.schinese: 首次收集到多于10,000G的金币。

displayName.schinese: 卡米恩•斯坦女士的请求
displayName.japanese: カルミネ・スタイン夫人からの要請

description.english: Attend all 4 acts of Lady Carmine’s plays.
description.french: Assistez aux 4 actes des pièces de Lady Carmine.
description.italian: Guarda tutti e 4 gli atti dello spettacolo di Lady Carmine.
description.spanish: Asiste a los 4 actos de la obra de Lady Carmine.
description.schinese: 观看卡米恩•斯坦女士的戏剧的全部4场演出。
description.japanese: カルミネ・スタイン夫人の全4公演を見る。
description.brazilian: Assista aos 4 atos da peça de Lady Carmine

description.english: Defeat The Beast once and for all.
description.french: Battez la bête une fois pour toutes.
description.italian: Sconfiggi la Bestia una volta per tutte.
description.spanish: Derrota a La Bestia de una vez por todas.
description.brazilian: Derrote a Besta de uma vez por todas.

displayName.japanese: 特に自慢することはない

description.english: Reach the E ending: Apostle of The Beast.
description.french: Atteignez la fin E : Apôtre de la Bête.
description.italian: Ottieni il Finale E : Apostolo della Bestia.
description.spanish: Obtén el final E: Apostol de La Bestia.
description.schinese: 首次达成结局E：野兽的新使徒。
description.japanese: Eのエンディングを達成： 野獣の新たな使徒。
description.brazilian: Alcance o final E: Apóstolo da Besta.

description.english: Reach the D ending: Another Beast.
description.french: Atteignez la fin D : Une autre bête.
description.italian: Ottieni il Finale D : Un’altra Bestia.
description.spanish: Obtén el final D: Otra Bestia.
description.schinese: 首次达成结局D：另一只野兽。
description.japanese: Dのエンディングを達成：もう一匹の野獣。
description.brazilian: Alcance o final D: Outra Besta.

displayName.italian: I tuoi sforzi non sono abbastanza
displayName.japanese: あなたには大きな使命が残っている。

description.english: Reach the C ending: The Beast is invincible.
description.french: Atteindre la fin C : La Bête est invincible.
description.italian: Ottieni il Finale C : la Bestia è invincibile.
description.spanish: Obtén el final C: La Bestia es invencible.
description.schinese: 首次达成结局C：野兽永远不灭。
description.japanese: Cのエンディングを達成 : 野獣は不滅である。
description.brazilian: Alcance o final C: A Besta é Invencível.

description.english: Reach the B ending: Back to a peaceful life.
description.french: Atteindre la fin B : retour à une vie paisible.
description.italian: Ottieni il Finale B : ritorno a una vita pacifica.
description.spanish: Obtén el final B: Regreso a la paz
description.schinese: 首次达成结局B：回到平稳的日常。
description.japanese: Bのエンディングを達成 : 平穏な日常に戻る。
description.brazilian: Alcance o final B: Retorno à vida pacífica.

displayName.japanese: ジェヴォーダンの救世主

description.english: Reach the A ending: The End.
description.spanish: Obtén él final A: El Fin
description.schinese: 首次达成结局A：完美结局。
description.japanese: Aのエンディングを達成 : Fin

description.english: Amass all of the equipment in the game.
description.italian: Accumula ogni singolo equipaggiamento del gioco.
description.spanish: Obtén todo el equipamiento del juego.
description.schinese: 收集到游戏中全部的物品。
description.japanese: ゲーム内のすべての装備を集める。
description.brazilian: Colete todos os equipamentos do jogo.

description.english: Unlock the last enemy in the bestiary.
description.french: Débloquez le dernier ennemi du bestiaire.
description.italian: Sblocca tutti i nemici nel Bestiario.
description.spanish: Desbloquea él último enemigo en él Bestiario
description.schinese: 解锁怪物图鉴里最后一个敌人的信息。
description.japanese: 魔物図鑑の最後の敵の情報をアンロックする。
description.brazilian: Destrave o último inimigo do bestiário.

description.english: Perform an attack that causes the enemy to lose 99,999 HP.
description.french: Effectuez une attaque qui fait perdre 99 999 PV à l'ennemi.
description.italian: Effettua un attacco che faccia perdere 9,999 PV al nemico.
description.spanish: Realiza un ataque que cause al enemigo un daño de 99,999 PV
description.schinese: 在单次攻击中，给敌人造成99,999体力的伤害。
description.japanese: 一度の攻撃で敵に99,999のHPダメージを与える。
description.brazilian: Realize um ataque que cause 99,999 de dano ao inimigo.

displayName.english: A lot of Fight in You
displayName.brazilian: Vocês é Que Estão Trancados Comigo!

description.schinese: 首次通过头目连战模式。
description.japanese: ボスラッシュモードをクリアする。

displayName.schinese: 战士的浪漫是属性全开

description.english: Reach full stats of 9,999 HP, 999 Mana, and 999 Orbs.
description.french: Atteignez des statistiques de 9 999 HP, 999 Mana et 999 Orbs.
description.italian: Ottieni i valori massimi di 99,999 HP, 999 Mana e 999 Globi.
description.spanish: Obtén estatus completo de 9,999 PV, 9,999 Mana y 9,999 Orbes
description.schinese: 使面版数值达到9,999 体力, 999 魔力和999 宝珠的最大上限。
description.japanese: HP9,999、マナ999、オーブ999の全ステータスを達成する。
description.brazilian: Alcance status máximo de 9,999 PV, 999 Mana, e 999 Orbes.

displayName.italian: Campione di Chronicles of the Wolf

description.english: Collect all other trophies in the game.
description.french: Récupérez tous les autres trophées du jeu.
description.italian: Ottieni tutti gli altri trofei del gioco.
description.japanese: 他のすべてのトロフィーを獲得する。
description.brazilian: Colete todos os outros troféus do jogo.
